description: Authenticate user with email and password. Accepts LoginInput with email (required, valid email format), password (required, minimum 8 characters), and optional geolocation data. Returns AuthPayload containing accessToken (JWT, expires in 30 minutes), refreshToken (JWT, expires in 7 days), and user info (uuid, email, name). Password is validated using bcrypt. Failed login attempts return UnauthorizedError (401). User history is tracked if geolocation provided (non-blocking). Token blacklisting is checked to prevent reuse of logged-out tokens.
graphql_operation: mutation Login($input: LoginInput!) { auth { login(input: $input) { accessToken refreshToken user { uuid email name } } } }
